subject: Major issue throttle pedal simsonn pro plus
description_text:
Hello,

I have a big issue with my throttle pedal on my Pro Plus. (Order #SSN1768)

When setting up my pedals, I wanted to limit my throttle pedal travel by
adjusting the blue stop block (picture 1).
But after adjustment, at the first test, the part which pushed on the
little grey spring, broke instantly. (picture 2 to 4). It seems that the
blue stop block and the now broken part went too close.

Please can you send me a replacement for these plastic parts in order to
repair my pedal.

Regards,
Valentin Charron
5 rue Réaumur, 85170 Saint-Denis-la-Chevasse, Vendée, France.
